result.arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ يَهۡدِيهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِإِيمَٰنِهِمۡۖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهِمُ ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ فِي جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
result.translation: 9. Diggah Yallaa kee Kay farmoytal yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abbaasite marah ken Rabbi Jannatti gita keenih yascasseeh tirri ken elle haa, usun yeemeneenemih sabbatah, sarra weeqaytitte как guba gexxa ruftole niqmat jannoota ken culsa.
